Message:
Freshly spilled blood
spread in slow waves,
its heat melting
the fallen snow.

Insulated by his overcoat,
my grandfather’s corpse
was still warm.

From his thin frame,
a trail of white smoke
floated up from
the bullet hole shot into
his back seconds before.

That was the declaration
the Inquisition imparted to me.

When I looked back,
my little sister was staring at
me with horror-stricken eyes,
a blade held to her neck.

Now, only one path
lay before me.

Killing all emotion in my voice,
I gave that single request.
In place of a response,
the Inquisitor’s lips only
curled into a sadistic smirk.
